meanings.definition: Of or relating to the present or recent times.

meanings.sent2: Her moderne dress was fashionable and up-to-date.
meanings.sent3: The cat's moderne behavior of playing with a tablet amused the family.

meanings.sent5: The moderne design of the building made it stand out in the cityscape.
